metadata.name: Infocalypse 1
metadata.description:
'Infocalypse' is composed of images designed for, or derived from, 'Dioxin Posse,' the graphic novel project that preceded 'Snow Crash,' evoking the data-saturated dystopian setting and the titular image of the novel. The project is a collaboration between Tony Sheeder, the artist behind 'Dioxin Posse,' artist and software developer Sterling Crispin, and author Neal Stephenson, to mark the 30th anniversary of the publication of 'Snow Crash.' 

The content associated with this NFT is governed by the BitJam LLC NFT License Agreement available at https://bkopy.io/nfts/explorer/infocalypse/1
